ch0071_00_otona/2701_1031_01_10:
You’ll lose in a flash if you
let your guard down.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_1031_03_10:
I’d love to teach you all
the ins and outs.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles on Pasio all depend on 
how fast you can make your next move.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_02_10: You’ll get blown away if you just stand there.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_03_10:
Your opponent won’t wait for you to make
a decision.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_04_10:
Just act before you think.
That’s a strategy, too!
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0702_01_10:
The best way to learn is to make your body
remember the feeling.
ch0071_00_otona/2701_0702_02_10:
If you’d like, I can give you a hands-on crash
course whenever you want.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_1031_01_10:
You have to keep track of
your Pokémon’s condition.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_1031_03_10:
I should check how to help
my Pokémon recover...
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_01_10:
Battles are all about strategy. Just attacking
won’t win battles for you.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_02_10:
For example, some moves can cause
status conditions.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_03_10:
You have to make sure that you have a way to
cure those, too.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_01_10:
There are a lot of different types of
status conditions.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_02_10:
Just like how there are all sorts of sicknesses and
diseases that people can suffer from.
ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_03_10:
You wouldn’t take cold medicine to treat a burn,
would you? You have to make sure you’re using
the right item for the right status condition.
ch0071_00_otona/2703_1031_03_10:
I personally like them to
be a little classy.
ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_01_10:
The more you love your Pokémon, the more they
will respond.
ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_02_10:
See? Look at that. The flowers she’s holding look
a lot more vibrant, right?
ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_03_10: Sorry, I’m so obsessed with Roserade right now!
ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_04_10: So...I don’t have time for you. And I’m not sorry.
ch0071_00_otona/2703_0702_01_10:
You’re soooo cute, Roserade!
I could just watch you all day!
ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_01_10:
As your senior, let me tell
you something.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_02_10:
It’s just great having
somebody by your side.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_03_10:
It’s sad, but life can be 
a bit lonely sometimes...
ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_01_10:
I always make sure to interact with my Pokémon
as a real adult should.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_02_10:
First, make sure you think of others’ feelings 
and don’t do anything that would hurt them.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_03_10:
Next, you have to stay with them.
Make sure they don’t get lonely without you.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_05_10:
I’m an adult, but that doesn’t make a difference.
Whether you’re an adult or a child—that doesn’t
matter to your Pokémon.
ch0071_00_otona/2704_0702_01_10:
Of course, there are a lot of grown-up Trainers
that can’t even do that.
ch0071_00_otona/2751_1031_01_10:
We look like mother
and child?
ch0071_00_otona/2751_1031_03_10:
I miss when I was like
that, too...
ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_01_10:
I wanna grow up 
to be like you!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_02_10:
Having a servant is a
status symbol!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_03_10:
I think my Pokémon is
the best!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_01_10: The Pokémon I trained are super-duper strong!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_02_10:
Oh, really? That’s exciting!
Do you want to have a battle?
ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_03_10: Yeah! If I win, you have to be my servant!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_05_10:
An older, pretty servant like you would be a
good status symbol!
ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_06_10:
Is this young naïveté?
Is this little girl serious?
ch0071_00_otona/1901_0101_01_10:
Mmm, I felt eyes on me.
Let me show you how a battle’s done.
ch0071_00_otona/1901_0601_01_10:
I have that bad habit of thinking I have the
upper hand, and I always fall flat.
ch0071_00_otona/1901_0601_03_10:
But I know I’ll forget these mistakes by tomorrow
and lather, rinse, repeat... That’s me.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_02_10:
I pride myself on my
beautiful and dignified
Pokémon battles.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_03_10:
We have to be beautiful
no matter where we are.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_01_10:
I’ll be the judge of whether you’re beautiful
or not.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_02_10:
Now, try to bedazzle me with a
Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_01_10:
What I want is a polished and beautiful
Pokémon battle.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_02_10:
Now, try to bedazzle me with a
Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_01_10: So beautiful that I was entranced by you.
ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_02_10:
Thank you for showing me such a
splendid bond.
